Name: TogepinAttackFoulArea
Notes: If the player enters this area, any TogepinScorer will detect this as a foul. If this happens, the player needs to get out of the area to make the mini-game resume. This area has no effect if the player is rolling around using the Rock power-up.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
